usageError.description: An error which represents a mis-use of an API and impedes correct functionality.

wrongType.description: This message indicates that a configuration option was not of the correct type. This primarily applies to languages that are not strongly typed.

message.parameterized: Config option "${name}" should be of type ${expectedType}, but received ${actualType}, using the default value (${defaultValue}).

parameters.name: The name of the configuration option.
parameters.expectedType: The correct type for the configuration option.
parameters.actualType: The incorrect types used for the configuration option.
parameters.defaultValue: The default value of the configuration option.

unknownOption.description: This message indicates that an unrecognized configuration option was provided. This primarily applied to languages that are not strongly typed.

parameters.name: The option that was not recognized.
